movie.title: Big Miracle
movie.plot: Based on an inspiring true story, a small-town news reporter (Krasinski) and a Greenpeace volunteer (Barrymore) enlist the help of rival superpowers to save three majestic gray whales trapped under the ice of the Arctic Circle. ‘Big Miracle’ is adapted from the nonfiction book ‘Freeing the Whales: How the Media Created the World’s Greatest Non-Event’ by Tom Rose.

events.title: a family of gray whales is found trapped in the ice in Alaska
Bamm-Bamm, the youngest of the whales, dies
the Russian ship Admiral Makarov finally breaks through the ice
